title: IN NEED OF A SUPPORT AND ADC
body:
We are a new team looking for  an adc and a support who work well together, also you must be levele 30 as this is a ranked team we have just started playing ranked so if you are not to good we will probably accept you..... any way add me my name is YouGotNoGrounds and the team name is PROTIGA
Hope to be playing with you soon

replies.body:
hey man im an adc main just looking to play i can probs synergize with any support
IGN:opportunist nz
Hey please add me, I have a support duo for ranked looking for ranked team BallSoHard
